data.name: BroBlast
data.detailed_description:
BroBlast is a top down Builder, where you manage resources and power to survive. Build Defenses to protect your base from Different Enemies that get more difficult. BroBlast has loads of content and a tech tree to unlock more locations!

Building!
Building in BroBlast is a Core mechanic! You can build different modules like; Batteries, Turrets, Miners and more! These Modules are used to keep your base working and to collect more resources so that you can build more!

Management!
Managing your resources is key in BroBlast, as you only get resources every once and a while! Power is also something you must manage!

Exploring!
Exploring in BroBlast is key! Unlocking new resources and expanding is crucial! You can dig deeper into the underground, as well as head to space!

Strategy!
After you have built your base and survived some basic enemies, you need to target certain enemies to keep your base safe!

What To expect!
BroBlast has multiple endings as well as being able to continue after the ending, not only that, but you can choose harder difficulties that make it so that you must decide on your defenses and power usage. Not only that but BroBlast Is Constantly getting updates!
